thread.title: Latoya James
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Latoya James

author: Latoya James
title: Latoya James
text: The guy that put my bedroom set on hold wasn't working when I picked it up the other guy rubbed me the wrong way when I got a mirror that was in the wrong place the guy implied that anyone could have put it there but the manager ended up giving it to me for that price but the guy said he wouldn't have did it if he were him (the manager)
